changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option permettant de n'utili: Addition of an option allowing to use only the positive hysteresis for heating
changelog.md.Ajout de la possibilité d'afficher une c: Added the ability to display a command of your choice on the thermostat widget
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Ajout de paramètre de delta consigne - t: Addition of delta setpoint parameter - outside temperature for calculating the hot / cold direction
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour le seuil de cycl: Addition of an option for the hot cycle threshold to allow the inertia to be taken into account
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option \"Seuil de cycle où l: Addition of an option "Cycle threshold or heating is considered hot
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le mode off du the: Bug correction on thermostat off mode
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour limiter la durée: Addition of an option to limit the duration of a second cycle to 100% of the time (allows to take into account the fact that the radiators are already hot
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les commandes or: Fixed a bug on orphaned orders
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le off: Correction of a bug on the off
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la FAQ sur les soucis de: Update of the FAQ on the concerns of non display of actions / modes
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option \"Limite les cycles m: Addition of an option "Limits on / off cycles (pellet, gas, fuel oil) and PID
changelog.md.Possibilité d'ajouter un message d'alert: Possibility to add an alert message if the thermostat has been suspended for more than XX minutes
changelog.md.Ajout en mode temporel d'un delta de con: Adding a set point delta in time mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le Smartstart si: Fixed a bug on the Smartstart if the agenda is deactivated after scheduling
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le panel mobile: Bug correction on the mobile panel
changelog.md.Ajout d'un calcul de performance (kWh\/D: Adding a performance calculation (kWh / DJU) if a consumption command is given to the plugin
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la gestion des a: Correction of a bug on the management of temperature sensor failure alerts
changelog.md.Ajout d'un champs pour une commande d'hu: Addition of a field for a humidity control (useful only for the Google Smarthome plugin
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la suspension du: Correction of a bug on the suspension of the thermostat when opening a window
changelog.md.Correction d'un warning dans le code: Correction of a warning in the code
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur les ouvertures\/fe: Bug fix on window openings / closings

index.md.Ce plugin permet de créer et gérer des t: This plugin allows you to create and manage thermostats to control the heating of your home
index.md.Il fonctionne selon 2 modes, au choix: It operates in 2 modes, your choice
index.md.correspond à l'allumage et l'extinction: corresponds to switching the heating on and off as a function of the interior temperature, in relation to a threshold corresponding to the setpoint
index.md.L'hystérésis permet d'éviter des commuta: The hysteresis allows to avoid too frequent switching when the temperature is around the set point
index.md.calcule un pourcentage de chauffage sur: calculates a percentage of heating over a predefined time cycle, taking into account the differences between the setpoint and the indoor and outdoor temperatures (insulation
index.md.Ce mode est plus précis, dispose d'un ap: This mode is more precise, has a learning function allowing automatic adjustment of the coefficients but may require some manual adjustments to adapt it to your installation
index.md.Important pour que le mode temporel marc: Important for the time mode to work, you absolutely need an indoor AND outdoor temperature sensor
index.md.Ce plugin est destiné à la création de t: This plugin is for creating thermostats in Jeedom
index.md.Il permet de piloter le chauffage, la cl: It can control heating, air conditioning or both
index.md.L'intérêt par rapport à un thermostat cl: The advantage compared to a conventional thermostat is that it will be able to be fully integrated into your home automation installation
index.md.Outre la régulation de température, car: In addition to temperature regulation, because this is what is asked first, the thermostat can interact with all the equipment in the house
index.md.la prise en compte de la température ext: taking into account the outside temperature, therefore the house's insulation coefficient
index.md.un système de régulation qui apprend pou: a regulatory system that learns to optimize regulation
index.md.la possibilité de gérer les ouvrants pou: the possibility of managing the doors to disengage the thermostat
index.md.la gestion des défaillances des équipeme: fault management of equipment, temperature sensors and heaters
index.md.une programmation complète avec le plugi: complete programming with the diary plugin, including the possibility of anticipating the change of setpoint so that the temperature is reached at the programmed time (Smartstart
index.md.Dans un premier temps, nous allons vous: First, we will show you the implementation, then detail the different settings of the thermostat configuration and finally, through some use cases, how we can enrich it in combination with other plugins or using scenarios
index.md.Le thermostat de Jeedom est très puissan: The Jeedom thermostat is very powerful but for traditional use, its implementation is really simple and quick, from the moment we understand the essential steps
index.md.définition du moteur de thermostat (hyst: definition of the Thermostat motor (hysteresis or time
index.md.C'est le choix de l'algorithme de régula: It is the choice of the regulation algorithm
index.md.chauffage uniquement, climatisation ou b: heating only, air conditioning or both, min and max temperatures of use
index.md.La définition des actions que le thermos: Defining the actions the thermostat should take to heat, cool, or shut down
index.md.La configuration des modes définit des t: The mode configuration defines predetermined set temperatures
index.md.Par exemple, le mode confort à 20°C, éco: For example, comfort mode at 20 ° C, eco at 18 ° C
index.md.Il peut y avoir aussi jour, nuit, vacanc: There may also be day, night, vacation, absence, etc ... here you start to see the possibilities of customization of the plugin
index.md.Pour affiner le mode de fonctionnement d: To refine the operating mode of the thermostat, you will also be able to configure openings that will temporarily interrupt the regulation (for example, an open window can stop the heating
index.md.La définition de cette interruption s'ef: The definition of this interruption is done here simply
index.md.La gestion des modes de défaillance pour: The management of failure modes for temperature sensors or for heating makes it possible to define actions to be executed for a degraded mode
index.md.L'onglet Configuration avancée permet d': The Advanced Configuration tab allows you to adjust the heating regulation parameters
index.md.Si de plus, vous disposez du plugin Agen: If in addition, you have the Agenda plugin, programming mode changes becomes possible directly from the programming tab
index.md.Votre thermostat est maintenant opératio: Your thermostat is now operational and by using scenarios or by combining it with other plugins (agenda, virtual, presence, ...), it will blend smoothly into your home automation installation
index.md.Voilà ce que l'on obtient par défaut sur: This is what we get by default on the Dashboard
index.md.Le verrou présent sur le widget permet d: The lock on the widget allows you to block the thermostat in a given setpoint, following an unforeseen event
index.md.La création d'un thermostat en détail: The creation of a thermostat in detail
index.md.Pour créer un nouveau thermostat, rendez: To create a new thermostat, go to the configuration page by pulling down the menu
index.md.situé en haut à gauche et renseignez le: located at the top left and enter the desired name for your thermostat
index.md.Dans un premier temps, nous allons rense: First, we will inform the general parameters of the thermostat
index.md.On les trouve en haut à gauche, section: They are found at the top left, general section and it is necessary to specify here the parent object, the activation and the visibility of the thermostat, usual information for any user of jeedom
index.md.En évidence sur cette image le Moteur de: Highlighted in this image is the thermostat operating motor
index.md.Il y a 2 algorithmes possibles pour la r: There are 2 possible algorithms for temperature regulation
index.md.la mise en route de votre chauffage se p: your heating starts up as soon as the temperature is lower than the setpoint minus the hysteresis and it turns off as soon as the temperature exceeds the setpoint plus the hysteresis
index.md.Par exemple, si on règle l'hystérésis à: For example, if the hysteresis is set at 1 ° C and the setpoint is 19 ° C, then the heating is activated when the temperature drops below 18 ° C and stops as soon as it reaches 20 ° C
index.md.Il est possible de ne prendre en compte: It is possible to take into account only the positive hysteresis by checking the box
index.md.Les paramètres à fournir sont l'hystérés: The parameters to be supplied are the hysteresis in ° C and the command which allows to retrieve the temperature measurement
index.md.On règlera l'hystérésis en fonction de l: The hysteresis will be adjusted according to the precision of the sensor, for example for a precise probe at 0
index.md.Le paramètre hystérésis se trouve dans l: The hysteresis parameter is found in the tab
index.md.Dans le cas du mode: In the case of the mode
index.md.la commande de chauffage ou de climatisa: the heating or air conditioning command is defined on a predefined cycle and the command execution time depends on the difference between the setpoint and the temperature measured by the sensor
index.md.L'algorithme va également calculer le te: The algorithm will also calculate the heating (or cooling) time over a cycle according to the inertia and the insulation of the room
index.md.Enfin, plus le temps de cycle sera grand: Finally, the longer the cycle time, the slower the regulation
index.md.A l'inverse, un temps trop faible provoq: Conversely, too short a time will cause frequent switching of your heating system which may not have time to heat the room volume effectively
index.md.Il est recommandé de ne pas trop diminue: It is recommended not to reduce this cycle time too much (acceptable values are between 30 and 60 minutes
index.md.Ce type de régulation est plus optimisé,: This type of regulation is more optimized, it improves comfort and allows substantial energy savings
index.md.Outre le mode de fonctionnement du therm: In addition to the operating mode of the thermostat, you can decide whether the thermostat is used in heating, cooling or both mode
index.md.Puis vous indiquez sa plage d'utilisatio: Then you indicate its range of use
index.md.les consignes minimale et maximale vont: the minimum and maximum setpoints will define the possible setpoint values accessible on the widget
index.md.Ensuite, il faut préciser les commandes: Then, you must specify the commands that allow you to measure the temperatures
index.md.Notez que le mode Temporel a impérativem: Note that the Temporal mode absolutely needs to know the outside temperature
index.md.Si vous ne disposez pas d'un capteur ext: If you do not have an outdoor sensor, this can be provided by the "Weather forecast" plugin
index.md.Voir ci-dessous le paragraphe sur les ac: See the paragraph on default actions below
index.md.Les champs `Température minimale` et `Te: The fields `` Minimum temperature '' and `` Maximum temperature '' define the operating range of the thermostat outside which a sensor failure is triggered
index.md.Il est également possible d'indiquer la: It is also possible to indicate the consumption per day in kWh of your heating
index.md.ce qui permettra d'afficher une indicati: which will display an indication of the performance of your heating by doing the calculation
index.md.Vous pouvez également afficher n'importe: You can also display any command of your choice on the thermostat by entering it in the field
index.md.Tout ce qui concerne les commandes du ra: Everything relating to the controls of the radiator or air conditioner is described in the tab
index.md.On peut y définir plusieurs actions, ce: Several actions can be defined there, which gives our thermostat the possibility of controlling different equipment (case of operation by zone for example or control of another thermostat
index.md.Les actions sont celles qui permettent d: Actions are those that allow heating, cooling (air conditioning), stopping the command
index.md.Une action complémentaire peut être envi: An additional action can be envisaged at each setpoint change, whether in manual or automatic mode
index.md.sont des consignes prédéterminées du the: are predetermined thermostat guidelines that fit your lifestyle
index.md.donne la température que vous souhaitez: give the temperature you want when everyone is asleep
index.md.détermine le comportement du thermostat: determines the behavior of the thermostat to have a comfortable temperature when you are present at home
index.md.Vous pouvez définir autant de modes que: You can define as many modes as you want to use them via scenarios (We will come back to this later
index.md.Dans l'image ci-dessous, le mode: In the image below, the mode
index.md.a une valeur de consigne de 19°C et pour: has a setpoint of 19 ° C and for the mode
index.md.le thermostat est réglé à 17°C: the thermostat is set at 17 ° C
index.md.programme le thermostat à 15°C en cas d': programs the thermostat at 15 ° C in the event of prolonged absence
index.md.Il n'est pas visible sur le Dashboard, c: It is not visible on the dashboard, because it is a scenario which programs all the equipment in
index.md.et ainsi positionner le thermostat sur c: and thus position the thermostat in this mode
index.md.Pour définir un mode, procédez comme sui: To define a mode, proceed as follows
index.md.donnez un nom à ce mode, par exemple `Ec: give a name to this mode, for example `Eco`
index.md.ajoutez une action et choisissez la comm: add an action and choose the command
index.md.ajustez la température souhaitée pour ce: adjust the desired temperature for this mode
index.md.pour faire apparaître ce mode sur le wid: to display this mode on the thermostat widget on the Dashboard
index.md.Attention lors du renommage d'un mode il: Attention during the renaming of a mode it is absolutely necessary to review the scenarios / equipment which use the old name to pass them on the new
index.md.Imaginons que vous souhaitez arrêter mom: Imagine that you want to temporarily stop your heating or air conditioning, for example to ventilate the room for which the thermostat is active
index.md.Pour détecter l'ouverture de la fenêtre,: To detect the opening of the window, you will use a sensor located on the opening of your window, thus allowing you to carry out this interruption by adding it in the tab of configuration of the openings
index.md.Deux paramètres supplémentaires sont rég: Two additional parameters can be set here; the opening and closing times of the window will cause the thermostat to stop and resume operation
index.md.Vous pouvez définir l'envoi d'une alerte: You can define the sending of an alert if one of the doors entered on this page remains open for more than `XX` minutes
index.md.Pour configurer le fonctionnement à l'ou: To configure the operation when the window is opened
index.md.sélectionnez l'info du capteur d'ouvertu: select the opening sensor info in the `Opening` field
index.md.ajuster le temps avant coupure du thermo: adjust the time before the thermostat switches off after opening in the `Switch off if open more than (min
index.md.ajuster le temps après fermeture de la f: adjust the time after closing the window allowing the thermostat to be restarted in the `Switch on if closed since (min
index.md.pour enregistrer la prise en compte des: to record the inclusion of openings
index.md.Il est possible de définir plusieurs ouv: It is possible to define several openings, this is necessary when the thermostat controls an area composed of several rooms
index.md.Prévoir un mode dégradé grâce à la gesti: Predict a degraded mode thanks to failure management
index.md.Les défaillances peuvent provenir soit d: Faults can come from either the temperature sensors or the heating control
index.md.Le thermostat peut détecter un défaut lo: The thermostat can detect a fault during a prolonged deviation of the temperature from the setpoint
index.md.Si les sondes utilisées par le thermosta: If the sensors used by the thermostat do not return a temperature change, for example in the event of battery wear, then the thermostat initiates fault actions
index.md.Lorsque le défaut survient, il est possi: When the fault occurs, it is possible to put the device in a predetermined operating mode, for example forcing the order of a pilot wire radiator
index.md.Plus simplement l'envoi d'un message par: More simply the sending of a message by sms or a notification allows to be warned and to intervene manually
index.md.Le paramètre qui permet au thermostat de: The parameter that allows the thermostat to decide on a probe failure is located in the tab
index.md.Il s'agit du `délai maximal entre 2 chan: This is the `maximum time between 2 temperature changes`
index.md.sélectionnez une action et remplissez le: select an action and fill in the associated fields
index.md.taper `scenario` sans accent dans le cha: type `scenario` without accent in the action field then click elsewhere to be able to enter the name of the scenario
index.md.Vous pouvez saisir plusieurs actions, qu: You can enter several actions, which will be executed in sequence and in the case of more complex actions, call up a scenario
index.md.Le bon fonctionnement du chauffage ou de: The proper functioning of the heating or air conditioning is conditioned by a good follow-up of instructions
index.md.Ainsi, si la température s'écarte de la: Thus, if the temperature deviates from the operating range of the thermostat, it initiates heating / air conditioning failure actions
index.md.Cette analyse s'effectue sur plusieurs c: This analysis is carried out over several cycles
index.md.Il s'agit de la `Marge de défaillance ch: These are the `Hot failure margin` for heating and the` Cold failure margin` for air conditioning
index.md.Gérer des cas particuliers avec la confi: Manage special cases with the advanced thermostat configuration
index.md.Cet onglet contient tous les paramètres: This tab contains all the parameters for adjusting the thermostat in time mode
index.md.Dans la plupart des cas, il n'est pas né: In most cases, it is not necessary to modify these values, since self-learning will automatically calculate the coefficients
index.md.Cependant, même si le thermostat peut s': However, even if the thermostat can adapt to most cases, it is possible to adjust the coefficients for an optimized configuration for your installation
index.md.il s'agit du gain du système de régulati: this is the gain of the regulatory system
index.md.Cette valeur est multipliée par l'écart: This value is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the interior temperature measured to deduce the heating / cooling time
index.md.ce paramètre indique l'état d'avancement: this parameter indicates the progress of learning
index.md.Une valeur de 1 indique le début de l'ap: A value of 1 indicates the start of learning, the algorithm performs a coarse adjustment of the coefficients
index.md.Puis au fur et à mesure que ce paramètre: Then as this parameter increases, the adjustment becomes more refined
index.md.Une valeur de 50 indique la fin de l'app: A value of 50 indicates the end of learning
index.md.ce coefficient est multiplié par l'écart: this coefficient is multiplied by the difference between the setpoint and the outside temperature measured to deduce the heating / air conditioning time
index.md.Il représente la contribution de la temp: It represents the contribution of the outside temperature to the heating / cooling time and its value is normally lower than the heating / cooling coefficient, in the case of a well insulated room
index.md.Apprentissage isolation chaud \/ Apprent: Learn hot insulation / Learn cold insulation
index.md.même fonction que ci-dessus, mais pour l: same function as above, but for the insulation coefficients
index.md.L'offset du chauffage permet de tenir co: The heating offset allows to take into account
index.md.normalement il ne devrait pas être fixe: normally it should not be fixed but we suppose that learning integrates the dynamic part in the other 2 coefficients. The
index.md.c'est par exemple un ordinateur qui va p: it is for example a computer which will cause a rise in temperature when it is turned on, but it may also be individuals (1 person = 80W on average), the refrigerator in the kitchen
index.md.Dans une pièce au sud, c'est une façade: In a room to the south, it is a sunny facade which can provide additional energy
index.md.En théorie, ce coefficient est négatif: In theory, this coefficient is negative
index.md.Offset à appliquer si le radiateur est c: Offset to be applied if the radiator is considered hot (%
index.md.à utiliser si votre système de contrôle: to be used if your heating control system has a significant inertia, whether due to the radiators, the configuration of the room (distance between the radiator and the temperature probe) or the temperature probe itself ( depending on the model, their reactivity is more or less
index.md.La conséquence visible de cette inertie: The visible consequence of this inertia is a temporary overshoot of the set point during significant temperature increases (set point which goes from 15 ° C to 19 ° C for example
index.md.Ce paramètre correspond au décalage cons: This parameter corresponds to the difference observed between the heating period (= heating is on) and the period when the temperature measured by the probe increases, divided by the length of the configured cycle
index.md.Par exemple, si on constate un décalage: For example, if there is a difference of 30 minutes between the start of heating and the start of temperature rise, and the duration of the heating cycles is set to 60 minutes, we can set this parameter 50%
index.md.Ainsi, quand un cycle de chauffe à 100%: Thus, when a 100% heating cycle is followed by another heating, this parameter allows to take into account the heat generated by the radiator in the first cycle but not yet measured by the probe for the calculation of the second cycle, by reducing d '' its heating power
index.md.La puissance du deuxième cycle sera alor: The power of the second cycle will then be reduced by 50% compared to the calculation made according to the temperature measured by the probe
index.md.case à cocher pour activer\/désactiver l: check box to activate / deactivate learning the coefficients
index.md.Cette option permet de donner de l'intel: This option allows you to give intelligence to the thermostat, by anticipating the change of setpoint so that the temperature is reached at the programmed time
index.md.Cette option nécessite d'avoir le plugin: This option requires having the agenda plugin
index.md.Attention pour que le smart start marche: Please note that for the smart start to work, it is essential that the learning is more than 25
index.md.Autre point il ne prend que l'événement: Another point it takes only the nearest event to come
index.md.il s'agit du cycle de calcul du thermost: this is the thermostat calculation cycle
index.md.En fin de cycle et en fonction de l'écar: At the end of the cycle and according to the difference between the temperatures and the setpoint, the thermostat calculates the heating time for the next cycle
index.md.Si le calcul aboutit à un temps de chauf: If the calculation results in a heating time lower than this value, then the thermostat considers that it is not necessary to heat / cool, the command will carry over to the next cycle
index.md.Cela permet d'éviter d'endommager certai: This avoids damaging certain devices such as stoves, but also achieves real energy efficiency
index.md.Marge de défaillance chaud \/ Marge de d: Hot Failure Margin / Cold Failure Margin
index.md.cette valeur est utilisée pour détecter: this value is used to detect a heating / air conditioning malfunction
index.md.Lorsque la température sort de cette mar: When the temperature exceeds this margin compared to the setpoint for more than 3 consecutive cycles, the thermostat switches to heating failure mode
index.md.Limite les cycles marche\/arrêt incessan: Limits incessant on / off cycles (pellet, gas, fuel oil) and PID
index.md.Cette option permet de faire de la régul: This option allows you to regulate with different heating levels
index.md.Le retour de la puissance du prochain cy: The return of power from the next cycle should give the new heating level setpoint to the heater
index.md.Les cycles se terminent à 100%, il faut: Cycles end at 100%, so have a short cycle time
index.md.Delta consigne - température extérieure: Delta setpoint - outside temperature for hot / cold direction
index.md.le thermostat choisi la direction (chauf: the thermostat chooses the direction (heating or air conditioning) according to the setpoint and the outside temperature (for reasons of savings, it is assumed that the inside temperature tends towards the outside temperature
index.md.Vous pouvez avec ces paramètres changer: With these parameters you can change the threshold
index.md.si vous voulez 25 et qu'il fait 22 dehor: if you want 25 and it is 22 outside by default the thermostat will go into heating mode (just put in this mode for the calculation it does not mean that it will heat), by setting the hot delta to 4 it will no longer heat because 25-22 = 3 and 3 <4 it will therefore go into cooling mode (if the interior temperature is above the setpoint
index.md.Cependant la phase d'initialisation peut: However, the initialization phase can be relatively long
index.md.Pendant cette phase, il convient d'avoir: During this phase, it is necessary to have sufficiently long periods during which the setpoint does not change
index.md.Toutes les commandes ne sont pas accessi: All commands are not accessible in programming, some are status information returned by the plugin
index.md.il est possible de faire les changements: it is possible to make the mode changes, by directly executing the commands (here, Comfort, Comfort morning, Eco, Holidays
index.md.cette commande coupe le thermostat, la r: this command cuts the thermostat, the regulation is no longer active, the heating / air conditioning is stopped
index.md.commande de verrouillage, il n'est pas p: lock command, it is not possible to modify the thermostat status (mode change, setpoint
index.md.déverrouille le thermostat permettant de: unlocks the thermostat to change its state
index.md.la régulation n'est active que pour refr: the regulation is only active to cool
index.md.modifie le coefficient d'offset du chauf: modifies the offset coefficient of the heating corresponding to the internal contributions
index.md.un scénario peut modifier ce paramètre e: a scenario can modify this parameter according to a presence detector for example
index.md.comme ci-dessus mais pour la climatisati: as above but for air conditioning
index.md.modifie le comportement du thermostat po: modifies the behavior of the thermostat to act both in heating and in air conditioning
index.md.uniquement disponible en mode temporel,: only available in time mode, this command indicates the percentage of heating / cooling time over the cycle time
index.md.uniquement disponible si vous avez une c: only available if you have an outdoor temperature control and a consumption control (in kWh, reset to 0 every day at 00:00
index.md.Celle-ci vous indique la performance de: This shows you the performance of your heating system compared to the unified degree day
index.md.uniquement disponible en mode temporel,: only available in time mode, this command allows you to enter a calculation delta on the setpoint
index.md.Si > 0 alors le thermostat va chercher s: If> 0 then the thermostat will seek if it should heat for (setpoint - delta / 2) if yes then it will seek to heat up to (setpoint + delta / 2
index.md.L'intérêt est de chauffer plus longtemps: The advantage is to heat longer but less often
index.md.Pour tout arrêter je dois: To stop everything I have to
index.md.L'utilisation du thermostat en mode `Cha: Using the thermostat in `Heating only` mode requires having defined the controls
index.md.En mode `Climatisation seulement`, il fa: In `Air conditioning only` mode, controls are required
index.md.Et en mode `Tout autorisé`, il est néces: And in `All authorized` mode, it is necessary to have entered the 3 commands
index.md.Un exemple concret d'utilisation du ther: A concrete example of using the thermostat
index.md.Lorsque votre thermostat est configuré,: When your thermostat is configured, you must carry out the programming
index.md.La meilleure méthode pour l'expliquer es: The best method to explain it is to take a use case
index.md.Ainsi, on souhaite programmer notre ther: So, we want to program our thermostat according to the hours of presence of the occupants of the house
index.md.Dans un premier temps, nous allons utili: First, we will use 2 scenarios to put the heating in mode
index.md.consigne 20°C) tous les matins de la sem: setpoint 20 ° C) every morning of the week between 5 a.m. and 7:30 a.m., then in the evening between 5 p.m. and 9 p.m
index.md.sera également activé le mercredi après-: will also be activated on Wednesday afternoons from 12 p.m. to 9 p.m. and on weekends from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m
index.md.Le reste du temps, le chauffage bascule: The rest of the time, the heating switches to
index.md.avec une consigne de 18°C: with a set point of 18 ° C
index.md.Sur le même principe, le scénario \"Chau: On the same principle, the "Eco Heating" scenario
index.md.Notez que dans les scénarios, le pilotag: Note that in the scenarios, the thermostat control is complete since we can act on the operating mode (heating or air conditioning only), the modes, the set value and the lock (lock, unlock
index.md.Si la création de scénario est parfois c: If scenario creation is sometimes complicated, for the programming of a thermostat, the combination of thermostat actions with the calendar of the agenda plugin makes it possible to do this simply
index.md.Le plugin agenda permet d'aller plus loi: The agenda plugin allows you to go further in programming and above all presents less risk of being wrong
index.md.En effet, par rapport à la programmation: Indeed, compared to the previous programming, the calendar will appear in clear on the screen and we will be able to take into account holidays, vacations .... In short, control the thermostat according to his lifestyle
index.md.Nous ne présentons pas ici le plugin Age: We do not present here the Agenda plugin, the objective being to couple it with the programming of the thermostat
index.md.A noter que si vous disposez du plugin a: Note that if you have the agenda plugin, a tab
index.md.apparaît dans la configuration du thermo: appears in the thermostat configuration, allowing direct access to the associated calendar
index.md.Nous allons donc créer un nouvel agenda: So we are going to create a new agenda named
index.md.auquel on ajoutera les événements de cha: to which will be added the thermostat mode change events
index.md.Une fois l'agenda créé, on va ajouter le: Once the calendar has been created, we will add the Morning (Monday to Friday from 5 a.m. to 7:30 a.m.), Evening (Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday from 5 p.m. to 9 p.m.), Wednesday (Wednesday from 12 p.m. to 9 p.m.) events, Weekend (8 a.m. to 10 p.m.), Public holidays
index.md.Tous ces événements, ont comme action de: All these events have as their starting action the selection of the mode
index.md.du thermostat et comme action de fin le: of the thermostat and as an end action the mode
index.md.Pour la programmation de l'évènement Soi: For the programming of the Evening event
index.md.Il suffit de réitérer pour chaque évènem: Just repeat for each event to get this colorful monthly agenda
index.md.En revenant dans la configuration du the: Returning to the thermostat configuration, you can access calendar events directly from the programming tab
index.md.Une fois le thermostat configuré, il est: Once the thermostat is configured, it is important to check its efficiency
index.md.Dans le menu `Accueil`, on trouve le sou: In the `Home` menu, there is the` Thermostat` submenu
index.md.La fenêtre qui s'affiche lorsqu'on sélec: The window that appears when you select this menu is divided into three areas
index.md.thermostat, pour visualiser l'état insta: thermostat, to view the instantaneous status of the thermostat
index.md.un graphique représentant le cumul du te: a graph representing the cumulative heating time per day (in number of hours
index.md.un autre graphique qui affiche les courb: another graph which displays the setpoint curves, interior temperature and heating status
index.md.Peut-on utiliser le thermostat avec un p: Can we use the thermostat with a heated floor, which has a high inertia
index.md.Le thermostat s'adapte pratiquement à to: The thermostat adapts practically to all cases, but this requires an in-depth analysis of your installation to adjust the coefficients, if you are in a particular situation
index.md.pour ajuster les coefficients, notamment: to adjust the coefficients, especially in the case of a heated floor
index.md.Plusieurs sujets sur le forum traitent d: Several topics on the forum deal with the use of the thermostat for different types of heating (stove, floor heating boiler, etc.)
index.md.C'est normal, le système corrige en perm: It's normal, the system constantly corrects its coefficients thanks to the self-learning system
index.md.Combien de temps faut-il, en mode tempor: How long does it take, in time mode, to learn
index.md.Il faut en moyenne 7 jours pour que le s: It takes on average 7 days for the system to learn and regulate optimally
index.md.La programmation du thermostat peut se f: The programming of the thermostat can be done either by a scenario, or with the use of the agenda plugin
index.md.Mon thermostat semble ne jamais passer e: My thermostat never seems to go into heating or air conditioning mode
index.md.Si le thermostat n'a pas de commande cor: If the thermostat does not have a control corresponding to heating and / or air conditioning, it cannot switch to these modes
index.md.J'ai beau changer la température ou le m: No matter how I change the temperature or the mode, the thermostat always returns to the previous state
index.md.Verifiez que votre thermostat n'est pas: Check that your thermostat is not locked
index.md.En mode hystéresis mon thermostat ne cha: In hysteresis mode my thermostat never changes state
index.md.C'est que les sondes de température ne r: It is that the temperature probes do not automatically raise their value, it is advisable to set up a "Cron of control
index.md.Les courbes du thermostat (en particulie: The curves of the thermostat (in particular the setpoint) do not seem to be correct
index.md.Regarder du coté du lissage de l'histori: Look at the smoothing side of the order history in question
index.md.En effet pour gagner en efficacité Jeedo: Indeed to gain in efficiency Jeedom averages the values over 5 minutes then over the hour
index.md.L'onglet mode\/action est vide et quand: The mode / action tab is empty and when I click on the add buttons it does nothing
index.md.Essayez de désactiver Adblock (ou tout a: Try to disable Adblock (or any other ad blocker), for some unknown reason these block the javaScript of the page for no reason
